text: is a Japanese professional golfer. Tokimatsu plays on the Japan Golf Tour and the Japan Challenge Tour. He had one win on each tour in 2016. Tokimatsu made his debut on American soil at the 2018 WGC-Bridgestone Invitational, having qualified by virtue of his win at the 2017 Bridgestone Open. ==Professional wins (4)== ===Japan Golf Tour wins (3)=== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:95%;" !No.!!Date!!Tournament!!Winning score!!Margin of victory!!Runner(s)-up |- |align=center|1 |align=right|24 Jul 2016 |Dunlop Srixon Fukushima Open |−25 (65-67-63-68=263) |3 strokes | Takashi Iwamoto |- |align=center|2 |align=right|22 Oct 2017 |Bridgestone Open |−9 (69-64=133)* |2 strokes | Lee Sang-hee |- |align=center|3 |align=right|20 May 2018 |Kansai Open Golf Championship |−10 (68-68-71-71=278) |1 stroke | Kunihiro Kamii, Shugo Imahira |} *Note: The 2017 Bridgestone Open was shortened to 36 holes due to severe rain. Japan Golf Tour playoff record (0–2) {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" !No.!!Year!!Tournament!!Opponents!!Result |-style="background:#F2C1D1;" |align=center|1 |2017 |ANA Open | Yuta Ikeda, Shugo Imahira |Ikeda won with birdie on first extra hole |-style="background:#F2C1D1;" |align=center|2 |2019 |ANA Open | Yosuke Asaji, Terumichi Kakazu, Seungsu Han, Shaun Norris |Asaji won with birdie on first extra hole |} ===Japan Challenge Tour wins (1)=== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:95%;" !No.!!Date!!Tournament!!Winning score!!Margin of victory!!Runners-up |- |align=center|1 |1 Jul 2016 |Japan Create Challenge |−9 (65-70=135) |Playoff | Yuto Soeda, Kwon Sung-yeol |} ==Results in major championships== {| cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" border="1" style="font- size: 95%; border: #aaa solid 1px; border-collapse: collapse;text- align:center;" |- style="background:#eeeeee;" !align="left"|Tournament !! 2018 |- |align=left|Masters Tournament |style="background:#eeeeee;"| |- |align=left|U.S. Open |style="background:#eeeeee;"| |- |align=left|The Open Championship |CUT |- |align=left|PGA Championship |CUT |} CUT = missed the half-way cut ==Results in World Golf Championships== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !Tournament !! 2018 |- |align="left"|Championship |style="background:#eeeeee;"| |- |align="left"|Match Play |style="background:#eeeeee;"| |- |align="left"|Invitational |T39 |- |align="left"|Champions |style="background:#eeeeee;"| |} "T" = tied ==Team appearances== Professional *Amata Friendship Cup (representing Japan): 2018 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Japanese male golfers Category:Japan Golf Tour golfers Category:Sportspeople from Fukuoka Prefecture Category:1993 births Category:Living people
